comments.text: When I select (View → Threads →) „Threads with Unread” filtering option for folder, the tab title and icon is no longer updated to its correct values (folder name and corresponding icon) after switching away and back (it doesn't change from previews not filtered one).
comments.creator: splewako@aviary.pl
comments.author: splewako@aviary.pl
comments.raw_text: When I select (View → Threads →) „Threads with Unread” filtering option for folder, the tab title and icon is no longer updated to its correct values (folder name and corresponding icon) after switching away and back (it doesn't change from previews not filtered one).

I also get following error when switching to such folder:

Błąd: uncaught exception: [Exception... "Component returned failure code: 0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) [nsIMsgDBView.numMsgsInView]"  nsresult: "0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED)"  location: "JS frame :: resource:///modules/dbViewWrapper.js :: DBViewWrapper__applyViewChanges :: line 1388"  data: no]

ludovic@hirlimann.net
comments.creator: ludovic@hirlimann.net
comments.text: Which tab title, do I need to open tabs before I can see that bug ?
comments.raw_text: Which tab title, do I need to open tabs before I can see that bug ?

This also affects window title.

(In reply to comment #2)
> do I need to open tabs before I can see that bug ?

No, you don't need to (I can see this in default/first one) but if you open such folder in a new tab, the title will be blank.
comments.text:
This also affects window title.

(In reply to comment #2)
> do I need to open tabs before I can see that bug ?

No, you don't need to (I can see this in default/first one) but if you open such folder in a new tab, the title will be blank.

comments.text:
Similar issue seen in 7.0.1:

Error: uncaught exception: [Exception... "Component returned failure code: 0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) [nsIMsgDBView.numMsgsInView]"  nsresult: "0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED)"  location: "JS frame :: resource:///modules/dbViewWrapper.js :: DBViewWrapper__applyViewChanges :: line 1388"  data: no]

I have several tabs open including one with threads-with-unread filtering enabled. Switching folders within that tab does not update the tab-title to reflect the folder name. The above error is triggered when switching /to/ the threads-with-unread folder from another folder.
